data.message: This I can not agree with sorry dawg I love your music man but that shirt is straight bullshit I never graduated school and I regret it every fucking minute of every fucking day man shits a hell of a lot harder without that education I solved the issue but I was just one of the lucky few this shirt is just wrong man a lot of these kids look up to you tell there youngster asses to stay in school

replies.message: You do realize what Eminem says a lot of times is tounge-in-cheek right? Chill.
Lol dude I'm not hating man just saying that's a wrong message to be sending to kids
It is, but so is twerking and the idea of blindly dumping a bucket of ice water on yourself in the name of charity simply because everyone else is doing it.
I agree twerking  is a horrible idea to put into kids the ice bucket thing was just stupid
The Ice Bucket challenge raised Millions of dollars for a good cause. Just be thankful it wasn't a "twerk while you do the ice bucket challenge" challenge. Lol.
I see "fuck school" which is how alot of kids feel and how im sure shady felt. It's not "Fuck Education" its not even "Fuck school, drop out" just an expression of anger at a frustrating system.
man you guys are awesome. I could sit around and read your comments day and night of every season
